annotations: Creative and detail-oriented executive chef with over 12 years of experience in high-end restaurants and hotel kitchens. Specialized in Mediterranean and Latin American cuisines. Strong leadership and team management skills, with a passion for culinary innovation and customer satisfaction.
- Designed seasonal tasting menus and daily specials for a 120-seat upscale restaurant.
- Supervised a kitchen team of 15, including sous-chefs, line cooks, and pastry staff.
- Negotiated with local suppliers to ensure fresh ingredients and reduced costs by 18%.
- Awarded “Best New Latin Cuisine Experience” by Miami Food Magazine in 2021.
- Assisted in kitchen management and menu planning for resort fine dining.
- Implemented kitchen hygiene protocols that passed 5 consecutive inspections.
- Managed banquet services for events up to 300 guests.
Le Cordon Bleu College of Culinary Arts – Miami | 2010 – 2012
- Chef of the Year – Florida Culinary Association, 2020
